title: Black Right-Pointing Double Triangle with Vertical Bar

adjectives: Immediately following in time or order
Coming next, either in sequence or in time.
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).

description: A symbol used in media players to indicate skipping to the next track (or scene). Shown as two triangles pointing right followed by a vertical bar.
apple_vendor_description: The next track button emoji on Apple devices is rendered as a sleek, modern icon, typically a white triangle pointing right, enclosed within a smooth, slightly rounded rectangular outline. Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading gives it a subtle depth and a polished, tactile feel, suggesting effortless control. This emoji, instantly recognizable on Apple devices, is universally understood to signify advancing to the next song, video, or item in a sequence, embodying forward progression and seamless media navigation.
